data.title: Mid-City (Government Street)
data.text:
Calandro’s Mid-City

(@ Government Street & Edison Street)

How to Find Us: Our original location on Government St. is located right in the heart of Baton Rouge – in ‘Mid-City’, as locals would say. We’re on Government St. between N. Acadian and S. Foster – right across the street from La Carreta Restaurant.

Calandro's Government Street

Calandro’s Government Street

4142 Government Street

Baton Rouge, LA 70806

(225) 383-7815

8am – 8pm : Mon-Sat | 8am – 7pm : Sun
